bestChampionshipPosition.description: The best championships position at the end of the season.

totalDriverOfTheDay.description: The total of driver of the day.

totalGrandSlams.description: The total of Grand Slams (pole position, win, fastest lap and led every lap).

placeName.description: The place name of the location.

time.description: The start time of the race (UTC).

gapLaps.description: The gap in numbers of laps.

fastestLap.description: Whether the driver had the fastest lap during the race.

driverOfTheDay.description: Whether the driver was voted driver of the day.

grandSlam.description: Whether the driver achieved a Grand Slam (pole position, win, fastest lap and led every lap).

timeMillis.description: The pit stop time in milliseconds.
